name: electron-angular2
author: Raynier
description: My Electron Video and Screen Recording App 2

scripts.build-win: ng build --prod --base-href ./ && electron-packager . SceenRecorder Demo --overwrite --ignore=("e2e|node_modules|src|.browserslistrc|.editorconfig|.gitignore|angular.json|karma.conf.js|package-lock.json|README.md|tsconfig.app.json|tsconfig.json|tsconfig.spec.json|tslint.json") --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32  --prune=true --out=./dist/electron-angular2-build --version-string.CompanyName=rleroux --version-string.FileDescription=rleroux --version-string.ProductName="Screen Recorder Demo"
scripts.build-winux: ng build --prod --base-href ./ && electron-packager . SceenRecorder Demo --overwrite --ignore=("e2e|node_modules|src|.browserslistrc|.editorconfig|.gitignore|angular.json|karma.conf.js|package-lock.json|README.md|tsconfig.app.json|tsconfig.json|tsconfig.spec.json|tslint.json") --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32  --prune=true --out=./dist/electron-angular-build --version-string.CompanyName=rleroux --version-string.FileDescription=rleroux --version-string.ProductName="ScreenRecorder Demo" && electron-packager . electron-angular2-build --overwrite --ignore=("e2e|node_modules|src|.browserslistrc|.editorconfig|.gitignore|angular.json|karma.conf.js|package-lock.json|README.md|tsconfig.app.json|tsconfig.json|tsconfig.spec.json|tslint.json") --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64  --prune=true --out=./dist/electron-angular2-build
